mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from board
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, writer, content ) values(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from board where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from board order by bno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select bno, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt from board
where title LIKE concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where content LIKE concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where title LIKE concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where writer LIKE concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by bno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
